### Course description

Introduction to computer programming for economics using R. The course emphasizes data management, visualization, exploratory analysis, and reproducible reporting for economic research.

### Course objectives

-   Develop proficiency in R programming for economic applications
-   Manage and transform datasets using the Tidyverse ecosystem.
-   Create and customize data visualizations with ggplot2.
-   Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to summarize and interpret economic data.
-   Produce reproducible reports with Quarto integrating narrative, code, and results.
